website_summaries.verdict: The Nokia 7.1 offers a winning combination of great performance, killer looks, and up-to-date Android software for a reasonable price.
pros: Guaranteed software updates through Android One Program

customer_reviews.title: Great phone - fatal software
customer_reviews.text: As long as the phone works, it is great. The camera shoots sharp and crisp photos incl. geotagging; apps run smoothly and battery life lasts an entire heavy use day. HOWEVER, my phone bricked while restarting after a security update and got stuck in 'Download Mode'. Nokia support was not very helpful and offered nothing but 'send in and repair' without any replacement phone for the meanwhile. Amazon promptly issued a replacement order free of charge. Phone (when working): 4/5 Phone (when bricking): 0/5 Nokia Support: 1/5 Amazon Support: 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Christoph

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Just buy it. You wont be disappointed. Form and finishing is excellent. Looks and feels better made than todays flagship smartphones.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisB

customer_reviews.title: Nokia 7.1 = nice quality phone
customer_reviews.text: At first, i was put off from buying this phone after reading "expert" reviews who said that the battery life was terrible and the phone could not live up to other competitors. However, after a few days of receiving this phone and messing about with all the features and stuff, i disagree with these negative reviews as the battery life has lasted for upto 2 days which is awesome!!!!! i haven't tested out the camera fully yet so i can't comment on this but in terms of the system and using apps and stuff, the phone runs very smoothly and hasn't caused any problems regarding memory etc.
customer_reviews.author: Chel

customer_reviews.title: A Nice Surprise.
customer_reviews.text: I switched from Samsung to Nokia simply because the model I wanted was out of stock. Pleased to say I'm delighted with the Nokia and I think it performs as well, even better in some aspects, than my Galaxy 5..The camera gives me great pictures and the battery life certainly out performs anything I've had before. Having said all that may I say my main use is for calls, surfing the Web, and occasional Skype.I never use it for games or anything associated with that. Hope this review is useful to you.
customer_reviews.author: John J

customer_reviews.title: Possibly best phone in price range with Android One loving.
customer_reviews.text: Just an awesome phone for the price. Has made me put down Huawei's and Honour's and come back to Nokia. Great camera, screen, and connection speeds. Battery is of course less than flagships but not bad by any means.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: This was a reluctant replacement for a Windows phone. On the positive side - the Android One system is less cluttered than other Android offerings. On the negative side - wifi reception deteriorates rapidly just short distances from the WIFI hub. doesn't work with the hands free SMS functionality in my car (BMW). this phone is very slippery. It will slide off any surface you put it on unless it is put in a case. Other than that - battery life, camera and screen are as you would expect for a device of this price.
customer_reviews.author: Randolph

customer_reviews.title: CHarging port has failed after about a year of use. Well known issue with this brand
customer_reviews.text: The phone was bought for my daughter along with a Nokia 8.1 for my wife. Both have the type C USB port and both have failed after a year of use. This is a common Nokia fault. The 8.1 has been repaired and returned under warranty and I now wish to send this phone back for the same reason. There appears to be no way to do this but Nokia have acknowledged the issue. Not impresssed.
customer_reviews.author: Hugh L

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Phone stopped working after 3 months, no support from Nokia but thankfully Amazon were extremely helpful in trying to help repair and eventually refunded me the phone in no time once it became apparent it couldn't be fixed. All credit to Amazon Support, can't recommend that you buy this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Cathal McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Bang for buck best buy
customer_reviews.text: As far as brand new phones for £165 go I wouldn't look further than this. Apart from video camera quality this phone will hold its own against any Samsung or iPhone. The camera is good battery lasts a day and it's sleek design is very impressive. The video camera isn't that bad just not quite perfect but keep the £800 between a new iPhone and go enjoy your life
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Mussett

customer_reviews.title: Broken power button
customer_reviews.text: I've had the phone for a bit over 2 weeks now and within the last couple of days, the on/off/screen off button suddenly stopped working. What a disappointment, considering this a brand new phone. I suspect this is due to poor materials used, so keep your hands off this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had to send it back!
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but I had so many problems, I had to send it back. When connecting to my broadband at home, it was agonisingly slow and took at least a minute to access any website. This was definitely NOT a problem with my home broadband as my other devices work well and quickly. The seller advised me on troubleshooting, including doing a factory reset, which I did - it took 48 hours to reload everything and there was no improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of phone, little monay
customer_reviews.text: Everything just fine. No lag, good size, good looking, most of all cheap so no need to insure etc. Camera is pretty standard but otherwise I don't see any reason to get a £1k flagship over this.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Feels great to have this new phone switching from the iphone. The iPhone is ass What I like is that the battery charges quite fast. Cameras good for portraits The only thing that's slightly annoying is the keyboard but then I type quite fast so it would happen with me. Overall it's a pretty good phone for the price
customer_reviews.author: Human Paraquat

customer_reviews.title: Very good phone for everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: It's worth noting that I am not a person who has to have the latest, fastest phone, more of a casual user. This phone is ideal for me, screen is very clear, all functions of the phone work perfectly and with light use the battery can last up to three days. On the occasion of heavy use, then the battery easily lasted then whole day with a bit to spare. Overall, I would recommend this phone but maybe not to the iPhone crowd!!
customer_reviews.author: Graham Warde

customer_reviews.title: Nokia 7.1
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the device for a few weeks and I am very happy with it, the battery life seems good lasting 4-5 days although I do not make use of the phone applications heavily during the day.
customer_reviews.author: CI

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service and phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone is excellent. I used Nokia phones before and went off them once they changed to windows. After reading the reviews I decided to give this phone a try and I'm so glad I did. Would definitely recommend this phone as an alternative to the iPhone or samsung. I would also like to say the seller provided excellent service also and I will definitely purchase other goods from them. A+ on all accounts
customer_reviews.author: Tigsy 73

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My son says it is a good phone and he is happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone, very easy to set up and the Android 1 system means you are updated automatically. Finger print sensor easy to use and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Roger S

customer_reviews.title: Aweful phone
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish phone really fragile glass breaks easily and it overheats within seconds of turning on and after a while keeps restarting by itself at random times throughout the day. DONT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slippier than a wet bar of soap
customer_reviews.text: Definitely buy a case for this bad boy or you'll be flinging it across the room every time you get it out of your pocket. It's good value for money, the screen isn't great but you get what you pay for. Anwyway, had it for a few months but it's now smashed to bits and i'm using my old phone again with a new battery
customer_reviews.author: apples

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone for the price point. Stock android. Very quick and excellent display. Battery life lasts a full day on moderate use all day.
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: Almost ideal!!
customer_reviews.text: A good Android phone. Easy to use, clear screen, good camera, good value, let down only by questionable battery life.
customer_reviews.author: homer

customer_reviews.title: Flaw in USB port - becomes are brick in less than 1 year - stay away from this phone
customer_reviews.text: Flaw in USB port; phone does not last even 1 year before it cannot be charged; Nokia not helpful
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: I would recommend this to anyone. It comes shipped with NO bloat-ware - just the bare minimum apps, leaving it up to you to install what you want. The quality is also outstanding for the money. Well done Nokia!
customer_reviews.author: Donald Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Good but quality drops down quickly
customer_reviews.text: Great phone at the start, but don't expect it to work after having it for 1 year plus.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Class Nokia phone
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant phone especially now upgraded to Android 10.Would be better dual sim.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My grandson recommended this phone for me, Perfect, easy to use, good camera, long battery life, easy to use email etc I like the bigger screen. All in all a good phone and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a high performance, low cost phone, and not a Chinese one because of the Google software update issues. This works perfectly! My friend also bought one. Exactly what I needed. Battery wasn't fantastic, but still lasts the whole day.
customer_reviews.author: Titan851

customer_reviews.title: Smart phone
customer_reviews.text: Good clear screen and easy to use except my fingers seem to be too large for the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: annben

customer_reviews.title: Great all round phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for my windows phone. I found this to be far better than my old Nokia. The large screen is bright and readable, the camera is good and battery lasts all day, what more do you need?
customer_reviews.author: Stan Turner

customer_reviews.title: Superb phone
customer_reviews.text: A very nice attractive phone with all the day to day features we require. Quick delivery, well packaged and a delight to use.
customer_reviews.author: BADDOGG

customer_reviews.title: Good phone but just mentioning an issue
customer_reviews.text: - Unable to insert SIM2 even though it supports. Struggled for a long time but looks like SIm2 slot is not proper. :( Overall good experience.
customer_reviews.author: Harsh

customer_reviews.title: Value for money!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic build quality! Not the fastest phone but good enough for everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOKIA 7.1 5.8 INCHES SMARTPHONE 3GB RAM SIM-FREE
customer_reviews.text: My sister loves this phone. We family bought it for her 60th Birthday present. She was amazed. She likes this phone very much. She is enjoying using this mobile phone.
customer_reviews.author: Hemlata Amin

customer_reviews.title: Nokia 7.1
customer_reviews.text: Excellent phone All major functions work well. Fits nicely in the palm of my wife's hand
customer_reviews.author: DeePee

customer_reviews.title: Download and read manual first
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup ut the finer details needed the manual
customer_reviews.author: Richard De Faoite

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It's faster than my 2 year old Samsung loving it and it looks so goid
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S. Stajniak

customer_reviews.title: It's a good phone
customer_reviews.text: It's a good device, it works as intended. I've got almost no problem with it. Techhut is a responsible and professional tech seller.
customer_reviews.author: Ion Spinu

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Works great despitr occasional self reboots when overworked. Picture quality can also do better. But all in all its a durable awesome phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid and reliability
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a descent reliable phone at an affordable price then you can't go wrong with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: David Goult

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I was fond of Nokia brand so thought I'd give it a try and must say very pleased so far. Quality product, not expensive and no bloatware !
customer_reviews.author: Daz

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Ok. For the money it’s not bad. It struggles a bit if your using lots of apps at once but that’s to be expected for this price point mobile. Other than that the update to Android pie was quick and slick. The phone itself is built really well. Got a nice weight to it but would definitely use a case as the back is quite slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow - what a bargain
customer_reviews.text: The Phone : Been using iPhones for years, but couldn't justify the price any longer. This phone is a 3rd of the price and really doesn't feel it at all. Great to see Nokia back in the game. The OS : Well Android has certainly come on also. It feels fresh and does pretty much what I want. Personally I find it a bit more fiddly than iOS, and I do feel that google is trying to extract information from me a little too much also, but I think with a bit of care that can be controlled also.
customer_reviews.author: buttons

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This phone is affordable at 150 pounds and I've found it to be silky smooth in operation compared to my previous Nokia with Windows installed , this model has Android one which gives you 2 years of software updates and 3 years security updates guaranteed . There is no gripes really and I remain impressed for the price . I would highly recommend it you like me are opposed to spending silly money for a phone
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Davies

customer_reviews.title: Charge Port Spells Untimely Demise
customer_reviews.text: This phone, in common with some other recent Nokias, has a poor quality charging port. After a little over a year it became progressively more difficult to charge, requiring the cable be gently positioned at the perfect angle. Too many monrings I wake up to find it hasn;t charged at all, rendering the phone next to useless. Modern smartphone's shouldn;t have catastrophic hardware issues after juat a year.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Security update bricked my phone
customer_reviews.text: I would advise against buying this phone. All was going well for a few months until a security update was downloaded. The phone then went into an endless loop of booting into "download mode". This seems to be a known issue with Nokia phones and appears to be caused by their software. The only solution appears to be a new phone, which means a complete loss of data! The minimum I expect from a phone is that it's own software doesn't render it useless.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Excellenet Android One phone.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is an absolute bargain for its price of £189. It was only released a few months ago as a mid-market (£300) phone. Lovely bright clear screem. Metal and glass - feels quality in the hand. Pure Android One so no bloatware and always up to date OS. Carl Zeiss double rear camera takes excellent pics and video. IMHO work the extra £40 over the Honor Lite 9.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Mcnish

customer_reviews.title: Great strong phone but buy a case to protect it
customer_reviews.text: Great phone took 5 days from Amazon Prime to arrive, the worst delivery on record! Very disappointed with Amazon. Couldn't even tell me if delivery would be morning or afternoon in the 20 first century! Appalling service. The phone however is great. I love it. Works well. I have not chosen to use the fingerprint reader yet. All the other services, email, news, chrome etc.. work well and fast. Even to setup even for a pensioner like me.
customer_reviews.author: Pilko

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Would have been a great phone but the problem is that there is no android 9 pie update for the UK yet. What is the point of the phone running on android one and not have the latest os. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mr

customer_reviews.title: Nice well made phone but not enough storage
customer_reviews.text: Nice well built Nokia phone wit a stunning display for the price. But with Android Pi installed, it is NOT possible to format an SD card for Internal storage, and so load many Apps onto this phone. So if you are interested in using many Apps and Games, then do not buy this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Completely broke April
customer_reviews.text: The phone is great for what I needed it for I purchased it December 2019 and it completely shut down never to start again March 2020. Expensive for a few months of work and it did shut down randomly before the epic "break"
customer_reviews.author: Miss Melody

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a mid range phone..
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone as an upgrade to my aging BB10 device as I needed a capable messaging device. Unfortunately it was impossible to get my work email to load thus defeating the point of the phone. That's notwithstanding some pretty shoddy service from Amazon warehouse, sending a book instead of the phone at the first attempt and then a phone without the requisite charging cable in the second.
customer_reviews.author: David L Reid

customer_reviews.title: Great until the software issue.
customer_reviews.text: I was rather upset because I loved this phone, but unfortunately, a software issue meant I had to return it. Everything else worked extremely well before this.
customer_reviews.author: James Davies

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for me wife as she wanted a cheap phone to replace her Samsung A3. I am amazed how good this is for the money. It looks great with the large screen and the camera is actually very good. In a lot of cases it has actually produced better looking photos than my Pixel 2. I'm tempted to get another one of these for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm really pleased with this phone great screen quality, good battery life, easy to set up. Camera takes wonderful photos. I am delighted with it.
customer_reviews.author: cherryblossom

customer_reviews.title: Lousy fingerprint reader
customer_reviews.text: Very bad reader , often takes several attempt to connect. Have had to re boot to manufacturers setting because of ' damaged data '. Not a good buy at all
customer_reviews.author: JohnD.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic phone
customer_reviews.text: Long time fan of Nokia and now that I'm forced to switch away from Windows phone I am more than happy with this new phone , very easy to setup and use with lots of fun features the camera is brilliant
customer_reviews.author: S. Holdsworth

customer_reviews.title: Simple good looking phone
customer_reviews.text: The product was as described. Excellent product simple to use with no bloat ware.
customer_reviews.author: SteveyT

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Has been back to the manufacturers twice. Not the make they were.
customer_reviews.author: Gareth

product_meta.title: Nokia 7.1 5.8 Inch Android One UK SIM-Free Smartphone with 3 GB RAM and 32 GB Storage (Single Sim) - Blue
product_meta.description:
Nokia 7.1 is all about capturing photos that look so good, you just have to share them. The dual rear cameras with ZEISS optics deliver stunning shots, while the AI technology lets you add an artistic touch to every photo with 3D personas, masks and filters. Capture every detail and take striking, true-to-life HDR photos with Nokia 7.1. You can capture crisper and sharper images with increased luminosity, a wider range of colours and more detail, in both bright and dark areas. Thanks to the sophisticated depth-sensing rear cameras with ZEISS Optics, you can capture professional-looking photos.

Experience every detail whether you are outdoors in bright sunlight or in a dimly lit room. SDR to HDR conversion Real-time SDR to HDR conversion brings HDR quality to all of your videos. HDR provides increased contrast for more true-to-life colours and vivid details, in films that stays true to the creator’s intent. Stream HDR movies and enjoy stunning cinema-quality HDR content from leading online providers. 

The look of Nokia 7.1 is the perfect combination of style and substance. The Full HD+ 5.84 Inch Pure Display screen with a 19: 9 ratio goes edge-to-edge for a bigger experience without the bigger handset. Glass front and back, shaped at the edges for comfort and with a 6000 series aluminium frame; Nokia 7.1 stands out with its diamond-cut coloured chamfers. 

Go all day without charging: The all-day battery life in Nokia 7.1 lets you watch, play and surf longer without charging and you will have enough performance for everything from AR gaming to streaming, thanks to the powerful Qualcomm Snapdragon 636 mobile platform.



BOX CONTAINS
1 x Handset
Charger Plug
USB Cable
Headset
SIM Door Pin
Safety Booklet
Quick Start Guide
feature_bullets: 12MP dual rear ZEISS Optics camera with SLR-style depth
Take a photo with both cameras using Google Assistant
Pure, secure and up-to-date with Android

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
